v1.18.0.description: removes the ability to have an aria-label based on new accessibility guidance

v1.16.0.description: adds new options to provide left/right padding to images

v1.13.0.description: changes handlebars files to check for f-pad option

v1.12.0.description: adds new options to provide vertical padding to images

v1.11.0.description: adds the ability to have an aria-label for images requiring a more verbose description to promote accessibility
